data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saldaitis, Aidas, Volynkin, Anton V. (2018): Description of the female of Smerkata zolotuhini (Lepidoptera: Endromidae). Zootaxa 4429 (3): 581-584, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4429.3.9|2 occurrences
